content: With this commit https://github.com/pierwill/influxdb_iox/commit/42c2c71fec4d074ea3af3cd42cfbdfe5838be973 I'm still getting errors from undocumented_unsafe_blocks when I run cargo clippy -- -Dclippy::undocumented-unsafe-blocks. I think this might be a bug in the clippy lint? I can't figure out what's wrong :(
I can't reproduce this, neither on Playground nor locally. This should not emit a warning.
Yeah I can't repro it outside this one project either :sad:
It's happening in our CI too, which is weird...
My only guess is, that you're using cached builds in CI. If that is the cause for this, that would be bad.
